tool_description: Identifies astrological aspects between planets and detects major aspect patterns like Grand Trines, T-Squares, and Grand Crosses.

planet_longitudes.description: Array of planetary longitudes in degrees.

orb_tolerance.description: Orb tolerance in degrees for aspect detection (1-10).

include_minor_aspects.description: Whether to include minor aspects like quintiles and septiles.

planet_names.description: Names corresponding to the longitude positions.

error_messages: Invalid longitude array: Must contain 8-15 values between 0 and 360 degrees.
Mismatched arrays: planet_longitudes and planet_names must have same length.
Invalid orb tolerance: Must be between 1 and 10 degrees.
Invalid planet names: Use standard astrological planet/point names.
usage: Provide planetary longitudes with corresponding names, set orb tolerance and minor aspect preferences. Returns detected aspects and major patterns.

major_aspects.description: List of major aspects found (e.g., 'Sun conjunct Moon')

minor_aspects.description: List of minor aspects if requested

aspect_patterns.description: Major patterns like Grand Trine, T-Square, Grand Cross
